title: Disco Bill
text: Disco Bill (1977) is an album by <a href="Bill%20Cosby">Bill Cosby</a>. It is his fifth, and last, musical comedy/parody album. As with "<a href="Bill%20Cosby%20Is%20Not%20Himself%20These%20Days">Bill Cosby Is Not Himself These Days</a>", Cosby stated he improvised much of the material on the album; as its name implies, the album spoofs the <a href="disco">disco</a> craze of the late 1970s.
